byline.original: By JON HURDLE and GRAHAM BOWLEY

abstract: Montgomery County, Pa, Judge Steven T O'Neill sets 2017 trial date for comedian and actor Bill Cosby, who faces criminal charges alleging sexual assault against former Temple Univ employee Andrea Constand in 2004; ruling also indicates O'Neill will consider motion by prosecution to allow accounts from 13 other women to be entered as evidence against Cosby.
lead_paragraph: A Pennsylvania judge set June 5, 2017, for the start of the criminal trial against Mr. Cosby on charges that he drugged and molested Andrea Constand at his home more than a decade ago.
snippet: A Pennsylvania judge set June 5, 2017, for the start of the criminal trial against Mr. Cosby on charges that he drugged and molested Andrea Constand at his home more than a decade ago....

headline.main: Bill Cosby to Stand Trial in Sexual Assault Case in June
headline.print_headline: Cosby Sexual Assault Case Is Set for Trial Next June
